metadata.title: CVE-2017-1000501 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
Awstats version 7.6 and earlier is vulnerable to a path traversal flaw inthe handling of the "config" and "migrate" parameters resulting inunauthenticated remote code execution.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-1000501` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

awstats - 7.2+dfsg-1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: awstats package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '7.2+dfsg-1ubuntu0.1').
